attributes.action: request the UN to investigate the United Kingdom's part in committing war crimes and crimes against humanity in Iraq
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Over 600,000 innocent people have been slaughtered as a result of the illegal war that the government led this country into.

One day people will face the consequences for their actions, and we the undersigned demand that the government are investigated at an international court.

Eventually, MPs and the government will have to accept this petition and the consequences of their votes in the commons.
